    • Method Detail

      • marshall

        public void marshall(Event event,
            OutputStream destination)
        Description copied from interface: Marshaller
        Serialises an event and sends it through an OutputStream.

        The marshaller should not close the given stream, use Marshaller.UncloseableOutputStream to prevent automatic calls to OutputStream.close().

        Specified by:
        marshall in interface Marshaller
        Parameters:
        event - event to serialise.
        destination - destination stream.

      • addInterfaceBinding

        public <T extends SentryInterface> void addInterfaceBinding(Class<T> sentryInterfaceClass,
                                                   InterfaceBinding<T> binding)

      • setCompression

        public void setCompression(boolean compression)
        Enables the JSON compression with deflate.
        Parameters:
        compression - state of the compression.
